preference.name: AWC_ReqImportAsHtml
preference.preference_description: Activates the visiblity of the "Enable editing" check box on import specification panel in Active Workspace. Valid values are: true : User will not be shown enable editing check box on import specification panel and requirements will be imported as html. This is the default value. false: User will see enable editing check box on import specification panel and has control to choose html or word during import.
